Class: DialogBox

DialogBox()

Dialog Box accepts one of the three props (renderWithPng, renderWithList, renderWithLoader) true at a time. renderWithPng recieves {visible, heading, subheading, buttontext, onPress } as props, renderWithLoader recieves {visible, subheading} as props and renderWithList recieves {visible, heading, subheading, text, negbtntext, posbtntext, onNegativePress, onPositivePress, multiSelect, _data } as props.

Constructor

new DialogBox()

Properties:
Name Type Description
renderWithPng boolean for showing the nointernet dialogBox with nointernet image
renderWithList boolean for showing dialogbox consisting header,text,subtext, list with radio button and two buttons
renderWithLoader booleand for showing dialogbox consisting loader and simpleText
visible boolean for showing dialog
heading string to show heading on the Dialog
subheading string to show text with fontSize 16
buttontext string to show text button with accent color
onPress callback on press of text button
text string to show some additional text with fontSize 14
negbtntext string to show text button with secondary color
posbtntext string to show text button with accent color
onNegativePress callback on press of text button with secondary color
onPositivePress callback on press of text button with accent color
_data array of variables used to show list with radio button
multiSelect boolean for selecting multiple items from list, if not initialized or false then we can select one item at a time only
Source:
  • components/Dialog/DialogBox.js, line 45
